titleStmt.title: The Dukes desk newly broken up wherein is discovered divers rare receipts of physick and surgery, good for men, women and children. Together with several medicines, to prevent, and cure the most pestilent diseases in any cattel. By W. Lovell, Gent. and traveller.
titleStmt.author: Lovell, William, gentleman and traveller.
